info.name: Keep Acceptance Test
info.description: Use this collection to run acceptance test on new Keep Builds. It will verify the Keep APIs used by EWS

item.name: Search Setup

exec:
const message = `Subject: Keep Acceptance Test messageA
\Mime-Version: 1.0 (Mac OS X Mail 13.4 \(3608.120.23.2.4\))
Content-Type: text/html;
	charset=us-ascii
X-Apple-Auto-Saved: 1
X-Apple-Base-Url: x-msg://5/
X-Apple-Mail-Remote-Attachments: NO
From: ${from}
X-Universally-Unique-Identifier: 528A7BA8-49C3-4935-92F1-D6CF5E749516
X-Apple-Windows-Friendly: 1
Date: Mon, 29 Mar 2021 17:54:50 -0400
X-Apple-Mail-Signature: 
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
Message-Id: <1DBB2965-BF87-42C8-BA02-B0117FB744F8@miramare.projectkeep.io>
X-Uniform-Type-Identifier: com.apple.mail-draft
To: ${to}

\<html><head></head><body dir="auto" style="word-wrap: break-word; -webkit-nbsp-mode: space; line-break: after-white-space;">I am regression testing Keep APIs. Random words: Draft lab FindMe246 animal Project. </body></html>
`;

request.description: Create a message from mime content. Send is set to true so the message will show up in the sent folder as well as the inbox.

`;

item.name: Calendar

body.raw:
{
    "Form": "Appointment",

    "From": "CN=Bert Muppet/O=Sesame",
    "AppointmentType": "2",
    "OrgTable": "P0",
    "_ViewIcon": "9",
    "Body": "This is created by Acceptance Tests.",
    "STARTDATETIME": "2021-07-16T04:00:00.000Z",
    "CalendarDateTime": "2021-07-16T04:00:00.000Z",
    "EndDateTime": "2021-07-17T04:00:00.000Z",
    "Location": "Test Location",
    "$Alarm": 1,
    "$AlarmOffset": -900,
    "$AlarmUnit": "M"
  }
